database.name: VIEW SSOPOS_SETUP_DOCXUSER
database.view: SELECT spsc.c_doctype_id_sales AS doctype_id, suc.ad_user_id, spsc.ad_org_id FROM ssopos_pos_so_conf spsc JOIN ssopos_user_conf suc ON suc.ssopos_pos_so_conf_id = spsc.ssopos_pos_so_conf_id UNION ALL SELECT spsc.c_doctype_id_return AS doctype_id, suc.ad_user_id, spsc.ad_org_id FROM ssopos_pos_so_conf spsc JOIN ssopos_user_conf suc ON suc.ssopos_pos_so_conf_id = spsc.ssopos_pos_so_conf_id
